text:
@BumbleBeeszy @NYGovCuomo is awesome.  He's competent.  He has good morals.  He cares about how everyone is affected by #COVID19 - unlike @realDonaldTrump who only cares about #MeMyselfAndI  

I watch my Governor's daily briefings because they are comforting.  He doesn't sugarcoat the truth. https://t.co/9DIFSSjy9G
